thread.title: Batum helps Hornets beat Pistons

title: Batum helps Hornets beat Pistons
text: Batum helps Hornets beat Pistons Thursday, 22 October 2015 (3 minutes ago) Nicolas Batum had 18 points and 10 rebounds to help the Charlotte Hornets move to 7-0 in the preseason with a 99-94 victory over the Detroit Pistons on Wednesday night. AUBURN HILLS, Mich. (AP) Nicolas Batum had 18 points and 10 rebounds to help the Charlotte Hornets move to 7-0 in the preseason with a 99-94 victory over the...
